name: SOC Playbook Gap Assessment Checklist

action--08851c3f-e873-43bd-9e0c-91b85396.name: Check for inefficient use of automation - repetitive tasks handled manually instead of via SOAR/SIEM integration.

commands.command: Check for inefficient use of automation - repetitive tasks handled manually instead of via SOAR/SIEM integration.
commands.description: Check for inefficient use of automation - repetitive tasks handled manually instead of via SOAR/SIEM integration.

action--2d268d14-5821-4c36-ab7a-d62bb152.name: Check for high error or missed step rates - important containment or communication steps skipped.

commands.command: Check for high error or missed step rates - important containment or communication steps skipped.
commands.description: Check for high error or missed step rates - important containment or communication steps skipped.

action--2e832017-712e-4dc2-b3a2-8ba9e9d8.name: Check for over-reliance on tribal knowledge - critical steps live in people's heads, not in documented playbooks.

commands.command: Check for over-reliance on tribal knowledge - critical steps live in people's heads, not in documented playbooks.
commands.description: Check for over-reliance on tribal knowledge - critical steps live in people's heads, not in documented playbooks.

action--3d6a8f1a-84c1-4fda-88fa-322e8719.name: Check for analyst burnout and alert fatigue - lack of structure forces analysts to reinvent processes repeatedly.

commands.command: Check for analyst burnout and alert fatigue - lack of structure forces analysts to reinvent processes repeatedly.
commands.description: Check for analyst burnout and alert fatigue - lack of structure forces analysts to reinvent processes repeatedly.

action--42f1e327-98b6-4eb9-9b18-e6a5bc8e.name: Check for poor knowledge transfer during turnover - new hires struggle without structured guidance.

commands.command: Check for poor knowledge transfer during turnover - new hires struggle without structured guidance.
commands.description: Check for poor knowledge transfer during turnover - new hires struggle without structured guidance.

action--6369cbee-11ed-4110-aabf-2ac0e3e0.name: Check for inconsistent responses to the same incident type - different analysts resolve the same alerts in different ways.

commands.command: Check for inconsistent responses to the same incident type - different analysts resolve the same alerts in different ways.
commands.description: Check for inconsistent responses to the same incident type - different analysts resolve the same alerts in different ways.

action--69e1143d-af62-4ec5-9162-2b4d3634.name: Check for difficulty adapting to new threats - playbooks only cover 'classic' scenarios, not modern TTPs.

commands.command: Check for difficulty adapting to new threats - playbooks only cover 'classic' scenarios, not modern TTPs.
commands.description: Check for difficulty adapting to new threats - playbooks only cover 'classic' scenarios, not modern TTPs.

action--7c576635-47e2-440e-ba9e-836de261.name: Check for delays in escalation or decision-making - unclear ownership of next steps.

commands.command: Check for delays in escalation or decision-making - unclear ownership of next steps.
commands.description: Check for delays in escalation or decision-making - unclear ownership of next steps.

action--8700b485-74be-41aa-b3ac-52f48aa7.name: Check for post-incident reviews reveal chaos - roles, responsibilities, and timelines unclear during real events.

commands.command: Check for post-incident reviews reveal chaos - roles, responsibilities, and timelines unclear during real events.
commands.description: Check for post-incident reviews reveal chaos - roles, responsibilities, and timelines unclear during real events.

action--b4740b12-d9ec-46cf-8139-f7cd9694.name: Check for compliance or audit gaps - auditors request documentation, but playbooks are outdated or missing.

commands.command: Check for compliance or audit gaps - auditors request documentation, but playbooks are outdated or missing.
commands.description: Check for compliance or audit gaps - auditors request documentation, but playbooks are outdated or missing.

description: A checklist to identify common gaps and weaknesses in Security Operations Center (SOC) playbooks, helping to improve incident response consistency and strengthen overall security posture.
